activity.title: Activity 1
activity.instructions: Read the movie reviews. Then click on the movie title that best completes each statement, according to the reviews.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)

question.reader: Bend It Like Beckham * * * 1/2 (PG-13, 112 minutes) An Indian girl (Parminder K. Nagra) living in London dreams of playing pro soccer, but her traditional Sikh parents want her to forget about soccer and marry a nice Indian boy. Just about the perfect teenage coming-of-age comedy. Finding Nemo * * * * (G, 101 minutes) A little clown fish gets lost, and his dad and another fish team up to find him. Visually beautiful, an adventure for kids plus a level of humor that adults will appreciate. The Heart of Me * * * (R, 96 minutes) Helena Bonham Carter stars as a woman who has the misfortune to fall in love with the husband (Paul Bettany) of her sister (Olivia Williams). Portrays London society, in the 1940s. Spellbound * * * (Unrated, suitable for all, 95 minutes) This Oscar-nominated U.S. documentary visits the homes of eight finalists for the National Spelling Bee, and then follows them to the finals in Washington. We get to know the kids and their families.
question.text: _____ is a funny movie about fish.

graphic.oae-label: graphic file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.jpg or .png)

audio.oae-label: audio file name (optional). Please include the file extension (.mp3)
